entry.summary: ...Elevated Water Levels Possible Sunday Along the Kuskokwim Delta Coast... entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 5:44AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Water Levels Possible Sunday Along the Northern Bristol Bay Coast... A storm system moving across the Northern Bering over the weekend will lead to the development of strong southerly winds across Bristol Bay for Sunday. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 1:34AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Water Levels Possible Sunday Into Wednesday Along South and West Facing Coastlines... A series of storms moving north through the Bering Sea and into the Southern Chukchi Sea over the weekend and into next week will bring a period of strong southerly winds to the West Coast from the Yukon Delta northward to Point Hope. entry.cap:areaDesc: Chukchi Sea Coast; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast; Yukon Delta

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 02 at 3:02PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...AREA CREEKS EXPECTED TO REMAIN HIGH THROUGH THE WEEKEND... Recent cold temperatures have caused area rivers and streams to increase in stage due to freeze-up. entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued December 03 at 8:27AM PST by NWS
entry.summary: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT: MANDATORY WOOD BURNING CURTAILMENT IN EFFECT... entry.title: Flood Warning issued December 03 at 8:42AM EST until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Volusia and Lake Counties. .The Saint Johns River at Astor remains in Minor Flood stage. It is forecast to continue a very slow fall while remaining within Minor Flood stage for the foreseeable future. Residents and interests along the river will continue to see Minor flood impacts.

SOUTHEASTERN CLARION...WESTERN FAYETTE...SOUTHERN WASHINGTON... INDIANA...WESTMORELAND...WETZEL...MARSHALL...NORTHWESTERN MONONGALIA AND MARION COUNTIES...

entry.title: Wind Advisory issued December 03 at 11:20AM EST until December 03 at 7:00PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Tucker County. * WHEN...Now until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree

entry.title: Wind Advisory issued December 03 at 10:24AM EST until December 03 at 4:00PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Southeast Randolph County. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.

entry.title: Wind Advisory issued December 03 at 9:27AM EST until December 03 at 7:00PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Maryland, Garrett and Extreme Western Allegany Counties. In West Virginia, Western Grant, Western Mineral and Western Pendleton Counties.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton
